img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_MiddleHollow_24.jpg)
Beyond the bridge is another next of Amourworms hiding in cocoons, and just past them the passageway opens out into a grassy area.
img_below_text:
Be wary of one of the mushrooms you can harvest here, as its actually a powerful Fungiman in disguise.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0b/Wukong_MiddleHollow_26.jpg)

content.text:

Beyond the bridge is another next of Amourworms hiding in cocoons, and just past them the passageway opens out into a grassy area."

![Wukong MiddleHollow 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0b/Wukong_MiddleHollow_26.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist in a grassy area beyond a bridge, surrounded by cocoons and webs. This setting is part of a walkthrough where players encounter Amourworms and must navigate cautiously, as some harvestable mushrooms may disguise powerful enemies like the Fungiman. The image serves to illustrate the environment and potential threats players face in this segment of the game.
